price: Parcourez la terre durant quatre mois; et sachez que vous ne réduirez pas Allah à l’impuissance et qu’Allah couvre d’ignominie les mécréants ."
arabic: فَسِيحُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَرۡبَعَةَ أَشۡهُرٖ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّكُمۡ غَيۡرُ مُعۡجِزِي ٱللَّهِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡزِي ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
footnotes: [363] C’est la proclamation de ce désaveuaux idolâtres.

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fasīḥū fī al-arḍi arbaʿata ashhurin wa-iʿ'lamū annakum ghayru muʿ'jizī al-lahi wa-anna al-laha mukh'zī al-kāfirīna
